meanings.definition: The act or process of producing photographs.
meanings.sent2: I learned about photoproductions in my photography class.
meanings.sent3: The photoproductions at the studio always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her photoproductions were like windows to another world.

meanings.definition: A company or organization that specializes in creating photographs.
meanings.sent1: The photoproductions in town offer various photography services.
meanings.sent2: I hired a professional photoproductions company for our family photos.
meanings.sent3: The photoproductions team captured the perfect moment.
meanings.sent4: Their photoproductions business is known for its high-quality work.
meanings.sent5: I visited the photoproductions studio to book a session.

meanings.definition: The result or output of a photographic production.
meanings.sent1: The photoproductions from the event turned out beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I was impressed by the photoproductions displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The photoproductions on the wall told a story.
meanings.sent4: His photoproductions were a reflection of his talent.
meanings.sent5: The photoproductions captured the essence of the moment.
